Action Recorder
Action Recorder
Speed up script development by simply pressing the "Record Actions" button in the editor and manually play the game. All of your manual actions will be translated to 
Gameplay recording is a significant time saver when making your own scripts and a solid starting point for your script. Recorded actions usually still need to be manually tweaked to be efficient or work correctly in some cases.
